Thank you!

Seriously, thank you for being the best conference attendees ever. Having run an event in another city, it was a very good reminder of just how lucky we were to have such awesome support here in Tampa Bay (and beyond). You all made the conf what it was.

Future event updates?

I'm going to start a separate list to hand off to whoever fires up the next event here in Tampa Bay. If you'd like to be notified when that happens, pop in your email address. (Don't worry, it'll only be to people that I trust.)

Thanks for the Thanks

I have to give an extra thank you to everyone who participated in putting together frontendthanks.com. It blew us away and made our year!

Iron Yard Scholarship

Many of you got to meet the folks from The Iron Yard and they're going to be firing up classes soon. They're offering up a nice break for conf attendees, too. Eric Dodds sent over some details...
For years Front End Design Conference and Dan Denney have been a central component the tech scene in Tampa Bay (and Florida as a whole!).
Everyone gave us a warm welcome into the area at the conference this past year. As a thank you, we are offering all past attendees a $500 scholarship for our courses launching September 22nd in St. Petersburg and Orlando!
If you've ever thought about taking the leap and launching a new career programming, there has never been a better time.
Simply apply to the program and mention you heard about The Iron Yard through Front-End Conf. Here are links to more information and the applications:
  • Learn more about The Iron Yard: theironyard.com
  • Learn more about Front End Engineering: theironyard.com/academy/front-end-engineering/
  • Apply to the Tampa Bay program: theironyard.typeform.com/to/hmT9NZ
  • Apply to the Orlando program: theironyard.typeform.com/to/X5SCGY
  • Learn more about Rails Engineering: theironyard.com/academy/rails-engineering/
  • Apply to the Tampa Bay program: theironyard.typeform.com/to/PfCfAp
Thank you,
Dan
